settings.heading: Ingredient bar
settings.extra_detail: This kind of "ingredient bar" focuses on highlighting the benefits of the active ingredients in a way that's familiar to consumers

settings.heading: Benefit
settings.tab_content: Boosted confidence: Using skincare and makeup products can help individuals feel more confident and empowered by enhancing their natural features and providing a sense of self-expression.

settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.tab_content:
Our products are carefully crafted with natural ingredients sourced from the earth to provide you with gentle yet powerful formulas that work in harmony with your skin.

We prioritize the use of natural botanicals, plant extracts, and essential oils known for their beneficial properties, ensuring that each product is packed with vitamins, antioxidants, and other nutrients to support healthy, radiant skin.

settings.heading: Shipping & Returns
settings.tab_content:
Shipping: We offer fast and reliable shipping to ensure your order reaches you in a timely manner.

Returns: We want you to love your purchase. If for any reason you are not completely satisfied with your order, we offer hassle-free returns within [number of days] days of delivery.

settings.heading: Tab title
settings.text: Describe your products, add product specifications, additional information and help customers know more about your brand and products.

settings.heading: Power Your Beauty Routine
settings.text: Elevate your beauty routine with our collection of sustainable and non-toxic cosmetics, crafted with care to enhance your natural beauty while respecting the planet.

settings.heading: Step 1: Cleanse
settings.description: Start your skincare routine by cleansing your face to remove dirt, oil, and impurities. Use a gentle cleanser suitable for your skin type (dry, oily, combination, sensitive).

settings.heading: Step 2: Tone
settings.description: After cleansing, apply a toner to balance your skin's pH and remove any remaining traces of impurities.

settings.heading: Step 3: Serum
settings.description: Serums are concentrated formulations designed to target specific skincare concerns. Apply a serum after toning to address issues like fine lines, hyperpigmentation, or hydration.

settings.heading: Step 4: Moisturise
settings.description: Moisturizers create a barrier that helps prevent water loss and keeps your skin smooth and supple.

settings.heading: Step 5: Eye
settings.description: The skin around the eyes is delicate and prone to aging signs, so it needs special attention. Use an eye cream or gel to address concerns like dark circles, puffiness, or fine lines.

settings.heading: What makes Puff Beauty Haven unique?
settings.row_content: Puff Beauty Haven stands out for its curated selection of skincare and makeup products that prioritize quality, efficacy, and a touch of elegance. Each product is handpicked to create a beauty haven for our customers.

settings.heading: How can I determine the right skincare products for my skin type?
settings.row_content: Explore our detailed product descriptions, which include information on skin types each product is suitable for. Additionally, our skincare specialists are available to provide personalized recommendations.

settings.heading: Do you offer samples of your products?
settings.row_content: At this time, we don't provide samples, but we offer a Puff Essentials Discovery Kit, perfect for those wanting to explore a selection of our curated products.
